entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Bracebridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:00 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -3.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 08:00 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -3.9°C
Pressure: 101.5 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 87 %

Dewpoint: -5.8°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to a few rain showers or drizzle and ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:08 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 08:08 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
